review: Great item!  Adds a whole new dimension to our telefvision experience.
author: Robert E. Misseck

review: AWESOME!!  Bought 2.  One for my parents and one for me.  We both have Google Chromecast but this Fire TV Stick is so much better.Sideloaded Kodi on it and my TV watching experience is so much more fun now.
author: C. Wong

review: Easy to setup and get started. Navigation was a little different but easy to use.
author: codex

review: cool product.  A must have for Amazon Prime members!
author: Melissa Keen

review: I am surprised of how well the Fire Stick performed. The remote control response quickly even at a distance.
author: James E. Bussey

review: For example "Swamp people" you can see just trailers except season 1.Offer too much but the service is very incomplete.The quality of the image is excelent
author: Alvaro M.

review: This thing is amazing!!! Easy as pie to install and run. I just wish they had one of these back in 1985.  It would have saved a lot of time and frustration. Not to mention beta and VHS tapes.
author: Christian C.

review: The Firestick is just what I needed so I could cancel our cable. There is so much to watch and it is so easy to install and use. Great idea.
author: Melody Ann Johnson "Fibermania"
